author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Autobio Diagnostics to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on May 8
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Autobio Diagnostics Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.72 yuan(before tax)/share for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 7
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 8 and the dividend will be paid on May 8
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/jjBr6K
